it.simonedegiacomi.goboxapi.client

Class StandardGBClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.simonedegiacomi.goboxapi.client.GBClient
      • it.simonedegiacomi.goboxapi.client.StandardGBClient

  • public class StandardGBClient
extends GBClient
    This is an implementation of the gobox api client interface. This client uses WebSocket to transfer the file list, to authenticate and to share events and use HTTP(s) to transfer the files.

      • getFile

        public void getFile(GBFile file,
                    java.io.OutputStream dst)
             throws ClientException,
                    java.io.IOException
        Download a file from the storage copying the file to the output stream. If you call this method with a file that is a folder, you'll get a compressed version of the folder This method close the destination stream
        Specified by:
        getFile in class GBClient
        Parameters:
        file - File to download.
        dst - Output stream where put the content of the file.
        Throws:
        ClientException - Error during the download
        java.io.IOException

      • uploadFile

        public void uploadFile(GBFile file,
                       java.io.InputStream stream)
                throws ClientException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Upload the file to the server reading his content from the input stream passed as argument. This method also ignore the generated event sent by the storage to the other clients.
        Specified by:
        uploadFile in class GBClient
        Parameters:
        file - File to send File to send. The object must have or the field father id or the path.
        stream - Stream of the file Stream that will be sent to the storage
        Throws:
        ClientException
        java.io.IOException

      • createDirectory

        public GBFile getInfo(GBFile father)

      • switchMode

        public void switchMode(StandardGBClient.ConnectionMode nextMode)
                throws ClientException
        Try to switch to the selected mode. This method will block the thread. If you try to switch to the current mode, nothing happen.
        Parameters:
        nextMode - Next mode to switch
        Throws:
        ClientException - Switch failed
